comments:

it's also not possible to navigate to a location in the build file from the
hyperlinks from the console output of ant if using external entities. The
hyperlinks just don't show up on the console.

Attempting to run build.xml from bug 32477.

Actually the StringIndexOutOfBoundsException was a more general problem with 
the BuildFailedTracker. Logged as bug 48012.

On the I20031202 build I cannot reproduce a problem (we have made fixes in 
this area related to other bugs).

My test case (the external entity has an error in the echo task):

<?xml version="1.0"  encoding="iso-8859-1"?>
<!DOCTYPE project   [
<!ENTITY simplecommon SYSTEM "simplecommon.xml">
]>

<project name="SomeProject" default="main" basedir=".">
  
<target name="main" depends="externaltarget1">
		 <echo message="test"/>
</target>
&simplecommon;
</project>

----simplecommon.xml----
<target name="externaltarget1">
		 <echo mesage="externaltarget1 in simplecommon"/>
</target>

Links show as expected.
Please reopen if you can reproduce and please provide test case. Thank you.
